author: inphi
content:
Here's the tentative devnet-5 spec - https://hackmd.io/@inphi/HJZo4vQGn. There are two changes I'd like to add to the spec:
- Add `dataGasUsed` to receipts for 4844 txs - https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/398
- Free the blobs updates for the EL - https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6610
I think we have consensus on the free the blob updates. But we need a code owner to approve. cc: <@555483069038198827>
The updates to the receipts is not a high priority as it's not consensus critical, but it'll be nice to have that included as well. cc: <@898563924440543283> <@403636673914863626>

author: acolytec3
content: Sounds good.  Note that we've added `dataGasPrice` as an additional optional field on the receipt object in the PR to make it dead simple to compute total data gas costs for a transaction (since as <@898563924440543283> rightly pointed out, `dataGasPrice` is non-trivial to compute)

author: acolytec3
content: We should have EthereumJS ready to test against the devnet-5 spec when it's ready (should already be up to date with free the blobs and I've got a PR ready for the datagas fields in the receipt
